name: Nokia Dino
description:
Nokia Dino is a game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 4.

Made by Gohiu and knightspear14

It's a game in which your goal is to increase your score to the maximum. To do this, you can buy items to help you!

In the shop, press 9/backSpace to go back to the game and press 0/Enter to buy an item

Command:

If you have a numpad, you can use the following schema :

Left : 1

Right: 3

Up/Jump: 5

Down: 2

Enter: 0

Quit : 9

Shoot: 4

Higher-Jump: 8

Otherwise, you can use the following schema:

Left : Left Arrow

Right: Right Arrow

Up/Jump: Up Arrow

Down: Down Arrow

Enter: Enter

Quit : BackSpace

Shoot: Space

Higher-Jump: Shift
